attributes.action: Remove the prohibition on calling an MP a liar in the House
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its about time MP's learned that to lie to the House is offensive.  Its about time the prohibition on calling out an MP who has lied to the House was removed.  Its simple to rebuke if no lie was told.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
